Reviews.Title: Surprisingly great package overall
Reviews.Author: InstantShinobi "Glenn"
Reviews.Content: I was completely suspicious of this thing before I bought it —at this price point I could have invested in a Canon Rebel series but my wife insisted on getting this. As I read the specs further, I was impressed by the array of social sharing options and the 21x optical zoom lens. I bought the Samsung camera and I am fairly impressed with the thing, for what it is: A consumer-friendly touch-heavy camera with some prosumer hardware.Pros:— Fast CPU and Android OS gives you a bunch of flexibility and apps!— Huge, bright screen give you the full view of everything the lens can see— 21x optical zoom; it doesn't get much better than this on a consumer camera!— 1080p video with auto-focus and zoom while shooting!— 4 fps photo mode at 16 MP; impressive capture speed (I'm using a 64 GB Class 10 SDXC card)— Wi-fi, Bluetooth, GPS geotagging, and cellular dataCons:— Horrible ergonomics for pro camera users (it takes some getting used to)— Daylight and action/angle shooting is tough when depending on an LCD screen— Color: Camera tends to push red and occasionally crush dark tones— Micro HDMI port is on the bottom: Very clunky for setting down to hook camera up to TV for viewing— Syncing with Mac OS (iPhoto) can be a pain. Android File Transfer works better than Kies to get both photos and video off the camera. The camera's OS does not properly follow DCIM protocol so it requires third-party software to be recognized on the Mac.

Reviews.Title: Nice and advanced product.
Reviews.Author: Carlos Alencar
Reviews.Content: It is amazing to have a machine counting on the whole resources of an android device. To send my photos immediatly to the cloud is fantastic. GPS and other apps are very usefull for a tourist. The hardware is also excellent,  specially the 21x zoom lenses. On the other hand, I found difficulties to find a suitable case - a high level product like that at least deserves a factory  included one.

Reviews.Title: Grey market Camera, no Warranty
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: While I am sure this camera is probably fantastic, the listing does not warn the user that the Camera is grey market, and Samsung Electronic service centers in the US will NOT honor the warranty. My would require being sent to a Samsung India service center.Off to find a similar model with a US warranty.

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: iMe
Reviews.Content: Let's be honest, a comparable camera with the same camera specs can be purchased for much less; however, the Galaxy camera isn't your typical camera and worth every penny for lots of people.Personally, the only reason why I purchased this camera is because I was shopping around for a camera.  I happened to visit my local AT&T; store to upgrade my phone, and noticed the Galaxy camera.  At first I was surprised to see a camera at the AT&T; store and wondered why someone would want to pay a monthly data plan for such a thing.  After playing with the camera for a bit, I was sold by the added features of Android - so I turned into one of those "dummies" willing to pay a data plan (AT&T; sees it as a tablet, so it's only $10 a month when added to a family plan).I did have to get my first unit exchanged due to a scratch inside the lens that was affecting all my pictures, but other than that, I have loved the Galaxy camera.  Picture quality is great for a point and shoot - of course not Olympus PEN or Sony NEX quality, but it's good.  What sets this camera apart from others is the mobile broadband and Android capabilities.  As a hobby photographer, I can now take pictures on the go while backing them all up into Google+ without having to search for WiFi or worry that my memory card might fail and I'll loose all my images.  When I get home, I can quickly download all my images without having to sync the camera (although the downloading does take longer than syncing).Here's a few benefits I have found in using this camera...-I can upload pictures to my Flickr account from anywhere (although Flicker's app doesn't support the Galaxy camera, I use an app called Flickr Uploader-If I don't know what a landmark is, I can rely on Google Goggles to find out for me (it's like a search engine where you search with images instead of words)-I can take pictures of stuff around the house, or even at yard sales, and list items on eBay from anywhere.There are also non-picture benefits, like using Google maps, getting the latest news updates while on the go, and the latest weather reports.  I can also play games while bored - which is a plus.  Recently I also purchased a Samsung S4, and it uses the same battery as this camera, so if my battery dies, my smart phone can be sacrificed.There are a few things I don't like, but I think the benefits outweigh these, so I'm not taking a star off the review...-I wish manual mode on the camera were more friendly - it's a nice to have, but impossible to use on a touch screen-Battery life isn't so good, but AT&T; gave me an extra battery and charger for free.  One thing to consider is getting the battery the Samsung S4 uses, as it lasts about 1/3 longer on the camera.-Memory card - although I purchased a class 10 MicroSD card, it would be nice if this camera could handle a regular class 10 card, as they cost a lot less.I think I'm sold on the Galaxy Camera, and it is my go to camera for almost everything.  Hopefully it's here to stay and Samsung won't kill it.  If it stays, this is what I would love to see in future versions...-A dial, or two, for added manual control-Option to add a viewfinder-Ability to replace lens (that would be nice)Although there's a lack of accessories for this camera (like cases), I really am happy with it.  I have had it for about two months, and although it doesn't take the best pictures (when compered to other camera I have, of have had), it is currently my favorite camera, and I usually have it one me.

Reviews.Title: Coolest gadget ever
Reviews.Author: Clifford L. Rosson "Cliff"
Reviews.Content: Reasons for only 4 stars.-Device came in chinese. I had to reference my Nexus 7 to change the language.-Device did not come with a manual. Had to download online.Everything else+ Full blown android powered camera!+ Works with Simple Mobile so say goodbye to terrible data contract plans.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera for following events and uploading quality images
Reviews.Author: rbr_man
Reviews.Content: I cover a lot of events on property and need a camera that take quality images for marketing/advertising that a regular phone just can not do. I wanted something that was able to upload straight to facebook or dropbox using our Wi-Fi and not have to pay for a carrier. Perfect match with more bells and whistles than I need, but like them

Reviews.Title: Gorgeous!
Reviews.Author: Renato Oliveira
Reviews.Content: This camera is absolutelly fantastic... It's a medium term between professional and portable talking about size with professional resources! Other very important points are: the connectivity (3G, Bluethoot and Wi-Fi) and the possibility to install several app to edit photos few seconds after take them. I recommend...

Reviews.Title: Factory Unlocked Samsung Galaxy Camera EK-GC100 8GB White, Android OS, v4.1...
Reviews.Author: Keokikealii
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Factory Unlocked Samsung Galaxy Camera EK-GC100 8GB White, Android OS, v4.1... on Sept. 13, 2013 and received it on the 19th along with a SanDisk Ultra 32 GB microSDHC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card that arrived on the same day (see my review for that item) and have used both items several times in setup and getting familiar wtth both and can really say I'm very, very satisfied with both items. The camera has far exceeded my expectatiions in performance so far. While shopping for this camera, I was told by salesmen and reviewers online that the EK-GC100 would not take slow motion video (120 fps) like the newer model EK-GC110, but I was pleasantly surprised to find out that it certainly does take slow motion video. In fact the EK-GC100 does something that the newer EK-GC 110 will not, and that is connect with a 4G network if a person so desires to subscribe to the service. Thank you Samsung and Amazon.com.

Reviews.Title: Too bulky, but in the right direction
Reviews.Author: bizzkizzle
Reviews.Content: I was just like you: I had to check it out."Woah! You mean I can use Google Play to download all the apps that I currently have on my galaxy s4!?" I thought as I pressed buy now and awaited the package to come in.Waited one day, waited half a day. Gotta love Amazon Prime, Camera's in!After opening the package and looking at the contents I realized I made a huge mistake. The camera is the size of two small digital cameras, the size of two canon digital cameras. The size of a samsung digital point and shoot camera with a screen on the front and on the back, but two of them. It's like putting a large rat in your pocket. It squirms around when you sit down because of it's weird shape and makes you very uncomfortable.All that being said, the camera itself works very well. I'm traveling to Europe to study abroad so I think it's a bit ridiculous to spend $399ish on a camera that may let me play games and edit my pictures.If you're looking for a big camera with the ability to upload directly to any app (Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, etc.) then this camera is perfect. I'd consider it's size to be equal to a DLSR, one of those gigantic cameras with the zoom. Again, in case you didn't get the point: This camera cannot fit in your pocket.Why I returned this item (and am awaiting my money back - day 2):--> Too big, like a large rat in my pocket (see above)--> Too expensive--> Why not just buy a Nokia Lumia 1020 for this money?Why I'm giving it three stars:--> Great quality pictures with AMAZING zoom--> Amazing HDish screen which really shows your image clearly with vivid colors--> It's a Samsung camera. Samsung is an amazing company and has great customer support.Any questions? Ask away, I'm near my computer frequently :)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera with an Amazing OS!
Reviews.Author: lucas710
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful camera. From the perfect operating system to the crisp HD video recording and the amazing photos you can take with it. I highly recommend this to anybody who needs/enjoys a point and shoot camera and wants to take amazing photos and then be able to edit them really quickly.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it
Reviews.Author: anna potts
Reviews.Content: AMAZING camera, LOVE itits packed with lots of features & you can put all kinds of apps on it, couldn't ask for a better camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera, with great 21x optical zoom and clear pictures, is like having a mini tablet and a camera.
Reviews.Author: Isaac Anaya
Reviews.Content: Good 21x optical zoom in picture and video, great 16 m.pixels.The screen is really clear. The touch screen is very good.The software is great, is like have a mini tablet (android) and a camera.A little bit bigger, definitely no a pocket camera.I paid $350 usd, is very fair, but  dont pay more than $450 usd in this camera is not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Stacy Dudley
Reviews.Content: All I get is ohhh's and ahhh's nice piece of equipment, especially for a novice.  I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: What camera!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: maso
Reviews.Content: For those who concemos android, a great help. One knows in advance what is brand new. Excellent photo quality 4.2 and 16.9, with a lot of no light for its large flashThe recording in HD is incredible, fantastic zoom more than, comfortable and easy to enter the menu for different shots.The best camera in this moment.

Reviews.Title: Excelent!!!
Reviews.Author: FELIPE SANCHEZ
Reviews.Content: Excelent camera!! It does everything!! You can connect with all social networks and upload your pictures instantly. This is awesome product.

Reviews.Title: My first smart camera
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM F SMITH
Reviews.Content: This is the most I've spent on a non-DSLR camera, but it was money well spent. I like the android OS as I have many android devices and I'm familiar with it. It takes great pictures and I love having it upload to my dropbox account like my phone does. The zoom is also a great feature. My only issues are the color of the camera (The padded grip and the strap are more blue than black. In sunlight, even the body looks blue) and having to relearn how to hold the camera without my thumbs hitting the screen. Overall, I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great w/ only one issue
Reviews.Author: K. Mangino
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera, with one exception... I had a hard time getting the image in focus at night, when I was in motion.  I took my girlfriend on a horse and carriage ride, and sat across from her to get a few photos of her while we were moving though some cobblestone streets... and all the images, unless we were stopped, were out of focus. There was enough light for the focus to work when we were moving- and it worked fine when we were stopped.  It needs image stabilization... again, I need to play with the camera more, as there might be a setting I don't know about yet for that.Other than that, the video is great, the other images came out amazing.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: chazz
Reviews.Content: Yes great camera able to take shots in a moving vehicle.Zooms . wonderful.Still learning features.The sound quality is fantastic.Love samsung.

Reviews.Title: Quite good.I recommend!
Reviews.Author: hari

} } } Length:: 0:29 MinsI has received the goods! Everything is wonderful! Good Camera, nice price, fast shipping,Quite good.I recommend!cons.it default is Spanish language. After sign up google account for android it change to english

Reviews.Title: Great camera with many possibilities to explore.
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: I have to admit that I spent a lot of time to research this camera including price, manuals, specifications, different models of Samsung Galaxy EK-GC100/110, sellers, all reviews etc. Samsung Galaxy EK-GC100 (sold on Amazon) is the best choice and price I could find anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Camera
Reviews.Author: Jerryhoz
Reviews.Content: Like all the features in the camera.  Have a slight problem connecting to cellular network. Reception is spotty, and floats in and out.

Reviews.Title: I would think twice before ordering ANYTHING from AVSolution.!!
Reviews.Author: Fabian
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera Sept 26 received it pretty fast Oct 1st 2013.. Which I was very impressed and excited to receive it.  As soonest I opened the shipping box.. I was NOT HAPPY AT ALL.. the camera box was crushed from three of the corners and all safety seals on this camera had been already opened.  So beware.!! The camera itself looked like it had been used.  The color on the camera was off white like some one handle it, with dirty hands.  Charging cord looked used also, the camera manual looks old and used. Wrote three emails to the seller and, they haven't bothered to write back or take resposibility.  FYI Amazon please band people like AVSolution to sell anything on your website... :(

Reviews.Title: Great Android camera, but probably not the best for the price
Reviews.Author: Sim Harbert "noisygecko"
Reviews.Content: While I do really like this camera, I think there are much better cameras out there for lower prices.  I got the International GSM one so that I can buy SIM cards when I travel to have maps and other data access when out of the country.  My Verizon phone is virtually useless outside the country.This camera is pretty big since the screen on the back is as big as my Galaxy Nexus.  The large screen makes it harder to hold since there is very little area to hold it with on the back.  It is very easy to hit the screen accidentally.That said, it is amazing to be able to use it to send emails, use Google Voice and even listen to music or watch Netflix.  I have Google+ automatic photo uploads going, so all my pictures are uploaded automatically as soon as I get to wifi.  Much better than EyeFi, which I could never get working very well.  It should work with Dropbox photo upload as well.The camera app is pretty good, but it has a bit of a strange interface.  It definitely could have been better.  But, it is usable and being able to clearly see the photos after shooting them is nice.  There are also a few Android apps out to enhance and modify the photos.

Reviews.Title: Not good enough
Reviews.Author: Andres G.
Reviews.Content: Nice to have Android in a camera, but in general it is slow, so you need to keep it clean so It works good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Myint Tun
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes excellent products, almost all my electronics are Samsung, Note 2, Note 3, Galaxy S4 phones, Table 8, Note 10.1" 2014 Edition. And now the Galaxy camera for my wife, she loves it and is great with the original Samsung Case.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy EK-GC100
Reviews.Author: Chapotin "ALZ849"
Reviews.Content: Excellent, camera till the momment, I need to study and practice a lot, to understand and know all the commamds on it. I like that have a voice commands, and works very Dell. By the momment I am very happy with this purchasse.  I recomended.

Reviews.Title: As advertised, mostly
Reviews.Author: Dwight Fitch
Reviews.Content: It's a samsung phone with a 16 mb camera.  Not easy to hold on to, but it performs as advertised.  Only other issue is that it has frozen a couple times, but I would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Nayanna amaral
Reviews.Content: i was dreaming about this camera for a looonnng time until my husband finally gave me one. very good quality!!!!

Reviews.Title: I recommend it
Reviews.Author: Oscar Zurita
Reviews.Content: Good resolution, nice pictures and very good price. It is my first camera like this and I am not dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: samsung camera
Reviews.Author: Priscila Diaz "PRI18"
Reviews.Content: this camerea is really awesome , has a lot of interesting functions, pocked camera full of color .I recommend for people who really know to use all the applicationes .

Reviews.Title: Super easy to use and the pictures are awesome.
Reviews.Author: Kari B.
Reviews.Content: Get apps and easy to use.  Love that you can upload directly from the camera.  The picture quality is amazing.

Reviews.Title: if your wife wanna buy a professional camera, please buy her one of this
Reviews.Author: mentor
Reviews.Content: if your wife wanna buy a professional camera, please buy her one of this!!! why she needs a professional camera at first? to upload her photos of shadows, landscapes, woods, dogs, parties, wasted friends, homeless people and obviusly their god damned coffees and food to fb, twitter and other social networks, and thats it!! I almoust forgot the bottle and sepia effects... well, back on the review, why you need to buy her an expensive, heavy, ugly and big professional camera? DONT DO IT!!! many friends of mine, bought expensive professional cameras to their wives(every woman your wife, girlfriend, sister mother has an artistic stage, do not deny it), for nothing, they going to use the cameras for a few months in birthdays, some picnics, and then... guess what? the camera will be end in a lonely and forgotten dark place... why because their awful and heavy... and be honest with yourselves, you wont to carry it everywhere, am I right?however, this camera its an excellent choice, because is lightly and takes HQ HD pictures and video, and you can upload in that precise moment using the 3g or share your mobile 3g with wifi... also you have all the android back up with google play, you are going to save more than 300 bucks at least if you buy this camera, and you never gonna regret it...

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Nina Hazelton
Reviews.Content: This canera does it all! With 2 young kids, it is quick enough, light enough and easy to use  to keep up with them and our travels.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera But Poor Samsung Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Delvina Belzil
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after reviewing it at Best Buy. But wanted to save some money and found one on Amazon, refurbished. It had lots of problems and I should've returned it…but it's too late now. I think it was hastily repackaged without checking it at all. Missing 8 GB internal Simm card, wrist strap connection was broken. Amazon did give me an additional discount for compensation. Later found out that the camera DOES NOT recognize ANY internal simm card (software issue) and without this feature you can't upload or share photos with others and the WiFi settings are not available also.This camera has the capability to talk with Samsung Tablet and Galaxy Phone. Went on vacation and took lots of beautiful pictures.Contacted Samsung Tech Support but they just gave me the run around. Buer beware, buy new not refurbished.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: William Wang
Reviews.Content: I love this camera so much. price I got compare with retail price, it is $200 Cheaper. this camera easy too use.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: FG
Reviews.Content: I really like this product, the brand is excellent, I recommend it. Would you purchase this item. good price and quality

Reviews.Title: everything you need in a camera and more
Reviews.Author: john quarshie
Reviews.Content: I already own one of this camera.this was a christmas gift for a friend who theatened to steal mine.awesome awesome awesome. Two other friends have started the process of purchasing one if the can find it a bit cheaper than I paid for mine.love it and cannot leave home without it

Reviews.Title: Provides really great photos even with little/no photography experience
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that would provide better pictures than my smart phone but wouldn't require with me removing a memory card, loading it in to a card reader, hooking it up to a laptop, running the pics through editing software, etc.  I guess I'm an instant gratification kinda girl.This camera is wonderful for that.  There are a lot of great pre-loaded settings for taking action shots, group pictures, portraits, landscapes, etc. but there's also the manual mode if you have enough experience to operate a SLR.  I'm still learning so I usually use a pre-set mode, but I do like the options provided to me.The pre-loaded editing software is also wonderful - a few taps of the screen lets you clean up and save your pictures immediately.Obviously the other benefit is the wifi capability.  Personally I haven't bothered to get a sim card for mine - I either wait until I get somewhere with wifi or I Bluetooth it to my phone if I want to post immediately.  The wifi capabilities also give you access to the ap store (obviously) which gives you access to an endless supply of camera/editing aps.Everyone that's played around with my camera (from other laymen to professional photographers) have been suitably impressed.  I personally am thrilled with it!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Hayes
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera after a recommendation from a friend.... First of all, it's user friendly.... and the quality of the pictures and video are amazing!And having the ability to share your pictures immediately is super convenient.  I would definitely recommend this camera to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Finally found the perfect Camera!!
Reviews.Author: T.Rich_23
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, the pictures come out really clear. It took me awhile to figure out how to work it at first and I kept falling back on my Canon. But I stuck with it and now I'm finding out all of the amazing things this camera can do. I just need to find a case that will fit it now.  It's a little on the big side but I can deal with the slightly larger camera in exchange for the pictures I get.

Reviews.Title: I'm sure I'll love it with time!
Reviews.Author: Mrs.Bruin24
Reviews.Content: My mom got this camera and I fell for it! but once I bought it for myself I was content with it, not super excited like I thought I might be. I think I just have to learn better use it and I think one of the major draws of the camera is it's ability to use the sim card and be connected and I don't do that,  I only connect at home on my my wifi. I also think my expectation were a little to high, I own a DSLR and although I got this camera as my always in my purse goes with me everywhere I go I was expecting DSLR quality and it's not, it's a point and shoot camera with a lot of cool features that I have yet to master. And like any point and shoot (actually every camera) it takes much better pictures outside on nice sunny days, in the dark not so much or I've had a hard time taking non blurry actions shots even when taken in that setting. One of the features I love about the camera is it's recording. It's easy to switch between the 2 settings and as mom I love being able to go back and forth snapping pixs and recording my lil one. All in all, I think it's a cool camera I just wish I knew how to better use it but that will come with time and practice.

Reviews.Title: Really cool gadget.
Reviews.Author: Olcan M. Martinez
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my purchase, functionality is great and picture quality is what it should be at this price range. Having the option to save pictures to Google drive or Dropbox or immediately sharing is excellent. It is not the best camera, but considering all the extra functionality it is a great package. At the $300 range it is a very sweet deal. One consideration, whatever the stated memory is, consider half of that is unavailable, it is used by the system, so get a memory card.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: suziedu
Reviews.Content: My Aunt has one who came to visit from Germany. We love it and bought one from Amazon. So many features, and still trying to learn to maximized it.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THE CAMERA.
Reviews.Author: Clifford A. Bullard "Dora Bullard"
Reviews.Content: This camera you cannot go wrong with this camera. I give it a 5. It has everything you ever want on a camera.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Camera EK-GC100 8GB Black, Android OS, v4.1 (Jelly Bean) 3G...
Reviews.Author: Larry L. Schwartz
Reviews.Content: This camera is really unique.  It is a wi-fi smart-tablet and it is also combined with a very good, well thought out camera.  You can use "Drop-Box" to store your photos and share them with friends and loved ones.  Great Product!!!

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: JEANNE DEAUEDE
Reviews.Content: This is the most user friendly piece of technology ever! It doesn't come with a "paper" manual because you absolutely don't need one.Some of the complaints I read about was the battery life and that hasn't been a problem at all.  I videoed a demolition taking place in our town for several hours and still had 3/4 of the battery life left.Takes amazing quality pictures I am thrilled.

Reviews.Title: What a treat
Reviews.Author: Burnis V.Back
Reviews.Content: I wanted a good camera, and certainly got one.  It is easy to use and can do everything but make a phone call.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves this thing!
Reviews.Author: Drew Dauffenbach
Reviews.Content: She does Social Media at work & it's so nice to have all her "work" accounts signed in on this instead of her personal cell phone. It takes great pictures & has all the features Android has to offer. Would highly recommend this!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Brad Feldstein "doctor4kydz"
Reviews.Content: Researched several different cameras before deciding on the Samsung Galaxy camera EK-GC100.  Seriously considered the Sony Cybershot DSC-HX50V, but I was concerned that the menus would be too difficult to navigate "on the fly".  When I finally saw the camera in person at a local store, I was immediately hooked.  The big, beautiful screen is amazing, and the touch screen interface is super easy to navigate.  (This is coming from a diehard iPhone user with no experience using the Android operating system.)The button that releases the pop-up flash was defective on the first unit that was shipped to me.  Because the order was fulfilled by Amazon, they authorized an immediate refund.  I ordered a new camera on Saturday evening and received it on Monday.  I was very impressed with Amazon's customer service.I was able to download the most recent version of Jely Bean, which added 4 additional shooting modes, for taking pictures of food, snow, etc.  I hope that additional features will continue to be added as the operating system continues to be upgraded.Connecting this camera to the internet is a breeze, too.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Nancy Mordhorst "njm"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera.  It is amazing.  The setting modes are incredible.  Best camera I have ever worked with and owned.

Reviews.Title: Need better online support
Reviews.Author: Lee P.
Reviews.Content: I bought a 64 GB. Micro card and the camera reads the card, however my pictures are not saving to the card!I had to print out the manual and have tried everything from the manual and so far nothing has solved the problem.I tried a 2 GB. Micro card and cannot save pictures to it either. Any one else with this problem? Any solution would be appreciated. I haven't found any help with support online :-(

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Jason Meeks
Reviews.Content: love it so far, hard to update in the US though - had to root it, and use odin for more updates.If using on sprint network, good luck

Reviews.Title: AWESOME camera, a bit overpriced
Reviews.Author: Matthew Franzel
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome camera. The only reason it lost a star is the price. Maybe $300 instead of $499?Anyways, it is basically a full android tablet but with a huge lens attached. You can set it up to automatically upload your photos to Dropbox, Amazon Cloud etc.Very responsive and great to take on outings. Since it is 3G capable, just pop in a SIM card and you can upload photos on the go!

Reviews.Title: Exiting!!
Reviews.Author: Veronica
Reviews.Content: Exiting!! Its a good camara... white camara it amazing, Nice delievered and good product but its too big for my hand.Exiting!!

Reviews.Title: Cool Baby Cool
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just as they say, this camera is marvelous. It takes breath taking snaps. Pictures that have life. I wonder why we've been carrying those massive cameras and mile long lenses all this time. I will recommend this camera anytime.

Reviews.Title: This is the most awesome camera i have every used.  Much better than S4 Zoom
Reviews.Author: The Graphite Girl
Reviews.Content: I love everything this camera does.  Scratching my head why it never really found a following.  Its a little bigger than i would have liked but still completely satisfied (and then some) with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Rafael Carneiro Augusto "RafaelCA"
Reviews.Content: Very good features. The pictures are really nice, clear, almost perfect. Its interactivity is something special. Congratulation Samsung, I loved this gadget.

Reviews.Title: was a gift
Reviews.Author: drewtx1
Reviews.Content: It is a nice camera, my wife love's it. I tried to add it to my at&t; data share plan but it does not work for some reason (the sim card) although when i use the sim card from my cell phone it does show up as at&t.; The manager said it puzzled him why it would not accept a sim card( new sim) other than that it works fine and is a good camera. using it as wifi right now.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera with many possibilities.
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: I have to mention that after selling my Sony camera I was looking for a new one for over 6 months and I found it. EK-GC100 with unlock GSM is the best choice what I was looking for. As mentioned before I spent a lot of time to research this camera including price, manuals, specifications, different models of Samsung Galaxy EK-GC100/110, sellers, all reviews etc. Samsung Galaxy EK-GC100 (sold on Amazon) is the best choice and price I could find anywhere on Internet and in the store. From reviews, few people mentioned that it could be worth it to buy if this camera could be use as a phone also. Someone answered that it is too bad that this camera couldn't be used as a shaver also. But in reality you can use this camera as a phone anywhere in the world, only what you need is the SIM card (Internet data) or free WiFi and Skype to worldwide or Europe or USA subscription.

Reviews.Title: great toy!
Reviews.Author: Jean-Marc Fort
Reviews.Content: im not into fones etc., where it gets difficult to just dial a number!. I wanted a small camera with some gadgets but, that takes great pics. and that it! still learning and, living in the carab, plenty of subjets to practice on. still having lots of fun learning and, its great to just send cool pics to friends right away with some comments. very cool cam!!!

Reviews.Title: Definitely worth every penny
Reviews.Author: Austin R
Reviews.Content: At first I was taken aback by the cost of the Galaxy Camera, and couldn't figure out why my friend had recommended it to me, since I am somewhat new to photography. But, with an amazing lens, crystal clear pictures, and more than 20 shooting modes to accommodate nearly any situation, I can definitely understand now. The picture quality is outstanding, the interface is easy to use but still provides advanced features, and the Android Jelly Bean OS is great. I got upgraded to 50GB of Dropbox for 2 yrs, and now all my pictures back up as soon as I take them. I never have to worry about losing anything. The physical build quality of the Galaxy Camera is outstanding as well. It does not feel light and cheap like some Samsung phones do, but it isn't heavy either. It's weighted well and feels good in the hand. 5 Stars.

Reviews.Title: junk camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera worked great until it deleted all my pictures everything is lost!! Complete garbage! No way to find deleted files on it, it should have a recovery option. This was the worst camera I ever owned. Never buy another Samsung.

ProductInfo.Features:
3G: HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100
Display: 720 x 1280 pixels, 4.8 inches (~306 ppi pixel density) Corning Gorilla Glass 2
Camera: 16.3 MP, 4608×3456 pixels, autofocus, 21x optical zoom, pop-up Xenon flash, AF light, Video: Yes, 1080p@30fps, 768x512@120fps
OS: Android OS, v4.1 (Jelly Bean)
CPU: Quad-core 1.4 GHz Cortex-A9 GPU: Mali-400MP
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Camera EK-GC100 8GB , Android OS, v4.1 (Jelly Bean) 3G Unlocked HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100 (International Version - No Warranty)
